item.title: RSA SecurID Authentication Manager
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://community.rsa.com/t5/general-security-advisories-and/rsa-customer-advisory-apache-vulnerability-log4j2-cve-2021-44228/ta-p/660501 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Version 8.6 Patch 1 contains a version of log4j that is vulnerable, but this vulnerability is not exploitable.
